attributes.action: Consider offering the job of Secretary of State for Environment to Jeremy Clarkson (Top Gear).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jeremy has such a naturaly understanding of environmental matters. He cares deeply about Crested Newts and would do anything for endangered Red Squirrels. Anyone that regularly watches the esteemed program 'Top Gear' will know that Mr Clarkson is an advocate of all things Green (but in private may of admitted to also being attracted to Red shiny things with prancing horses).

Jezza is kind, considerate and though a bit of a long streak is also a trend-setter of Mens' fashion. In today's world of 'image over substance' he is without doubt the man for the job.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
